00067 /* ************************ main time area region *********************** */
00068 
00069 static void time_draw_sfra_efra(Scene *scene, View2D *v2d)
00070 {   
00071     /* draw darkened area outside of active timeline 
00072      * frame range used is preview range or scene range 
00073      */
00074     glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00075     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00076         glColor4f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.4f);
00077         
00078         if (PSFRA < PEFRA) {
00079             glRectf(v2d->cur.xmin, v2d->cur.ymin, (float)PSFRA, v2d->cur.ymax);
00080             glRectf((float)PEFRA, v2d->cur.ymin, v2d->cur.xmax, v2d->cur.ymax);
00081         }
00082         else {
00083             glRectf(v2d->cur.xmin, v2d->cur.ymin, v2d->cur.xmax, v2d->cur.ymax);
00084         }
00085     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00086 
00087     UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BACK, -60);
00088     /* thin lines where the actual frames are */
00089     fdrawline((float)PSFRA, v2d->cur.ymin, (float)PSFRA, v2d->cur.ymax);
00090     fdrawline((float)PEFRA, v2d->cur.ymin, (float)PEFRA, v2d->cur.ymax);
00091 }
00092 
00093 #define CACHE_DRAW_HEIGHT   3.0f
00094 
00095 static void time_draw_cache(SpaceTime *stime, Object *ob)
00096 {
00097     PTCacheID *pid;
00098     ListBase pidlist;
00099     SpaceTimeCache *stc = stime->caches.first;
00100     float yoffs=0.f;
00101     
00102     if (!(stime->cache_display & TIME_CACHE_DISPLAY) || (!ob))
00103         return;
00104 
00105     BKE_ptcache_ids_from_object(&pidlist, ob, NULL, 0);
00106 
00107     /* iterate over pointcaches on the active object, 
00108      * add spacetimecache and vertex array for each */
00109     for (pid=pidlist.first; pid; pid=pid->next) {
00110         float col[4], *fp;
00111         int i, sta = pid->cache->startframe, end = pid->cache->endframe;
00112         int len = (end - sta + 1)*4;
00113 
00114         switch(pid->type) {
00115             case PTCACHE_TYPE_SOFTBODY:
00116                 if (!(stime->cache_display & TIME_CACHE_SOFTBODY)) continue;
00117                 break;
00118             case PTCACHE_TYPE_PARTICLES:
00119                 if (!(stime->cache_display & TIME_CACHE_PARTICLES)) continue;
00120                 break;
00121             case PTCACHE_TYPE_CLOTH:
00122                 if (!(stime->cache_display & TIME_CACHE_CLOTH)) continue;
00123                 break;
00124             case PTCACHE_TYPE_SMOKE_DOMAIN:
00125             case PTCACHE_TYPE_SMOKE_HIGHRES:
00126                 if (!(stime->cache_display & TIME_CACHE_SMOKE)) continue;
00127                 break;
00128             case PTCACHE_TYPE_DYNAMICPAINT:
00129                 if (!(stime->cache_display & TIME_CACHE_DYNAMICPAINT))  continue;
00130                 break;
00131         }
00132 
00133         if (pid->cache->cached_frames == NULL)
00134             continue;
00135 
00136         /* make sure we have stc with correct array length */
00137         if (stc == NULL || MEM_allocN_len(stc->array) != len*2*sizeof(float)) {
00138             if (stc) {
00139                 MEM_freeN(stc->array);
00140             }
00141             else {
00142                 stc = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SpaceTimeCache), "spacetimecache");
00143                 BLI_addtail(&stime->caches, stc);
00144             }
00145 
00146             stc->array = MEM_callocN(len*2*sizeof(float), "SpaceTimeCache array");
00147         }
00148 
00149         /* fill the vertex array with a quad for each cached frame */
00150         for (i=sta, fp=stc->array; i<=end; i++) {
00151             if (pid->cache->cached_frames[i-sta]) {
00152                 fp[0] = (float)i-0.5f;
00153                 fp[1] = 0.0;
00154                 fp+=2;
00155                 
00156                 fp[0] = (float)i-0.5f;
00157                 fp[1] = 1.0;
00158                 fp+=2;
00159                 
00160                 fp[0] = (float)i+0.5f;
00161                 fp[1] = 1.0;
00162                 fp+=2;
00163                 
00164                 fp[0] = (float)i+0.5f;
00165                 fp[1] = 0.0;
00166                 fp+=2;
00167             }
00168         }
00169         
00170         glPushMatrix();
00171         glTranslatef(0.0, (float)V2D_SCROLL_HEIGHT+yoffs, 0.0);
00172         glScalef(1.0, CACHE_DRAW_HEIGHT, 0.0);
00173         
00174         switch(pid->type) {
00175             case PTCACHE_TYPE_SOFTBODY:
00176                 col[0] = 1.0;   col[1] = 0.4;   col[2] = 0.02;
00177                 col[3] = 0.1;
00178                 break;
00179             case PTCACHE_TYPE_PARTICLES:
00180                 col[0] = 1.0;   col[1] = 0.1;   col[2] = 0.02;
00181                 col[3] = 0.1;
00182                 break;
00183             case PTCACHE_TYPE_CLOTH:
00184                 col[0] = 0.1;   col[1] = 0.1;   col[2] = 0.75;
00185                 col[3] = 0.1;
00186                 break;
00187             case PTCACHE_TYPE_SMOKE_DOMAIN:
00188             case PTCACHE_TYPE_SMOKE_HIGHRES:
00189                 col[0] = 0.2;   col[1] = 0.2;   col[2] = 0.2;
00190                 col[3] = 0.1;
00191                 break;
00192             case PTCACHE_TYPE_DYNAMICPAINT:
00193                 col[0] = 1.0;   col[1] = 0.1;   col[2] = 0.75;
00194                 col[3] = 0.1;
00195                 break;
00196             default:
00197                 BLI_assert(0);
00198                 col[0] = 1.0;   col[1] = 0.0;   col[2] = 1.0;
00199                 col[3] = 0.1;
00200         }
00201         glColor4fv(col);
00202         
00203         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00204         
00205         glRectf((float)sta, 0.0, (float)end, 1.0);
00206         
00207         col[3] = 0.4f;
00208         if (pid->cache->flag & PTCACHE_BAKED) {
00209             col[0] -= 0.4f; col[1] -= 0.4f; col[2] -= 0.4f;
00210         }
00211         glColor4fv(col);
00212         
00213         glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00214         glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, stc->array);
00215         glDrawArrays(GL_QUADS, 0, (fp-stc->array)/2);
00216         glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00217         
00218         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00219         
00220         glPopMatrix();
00221         
00222         yoffs += CACHE_DRAW_HEIGHT;
00223 
00224         stc = stc->next;
00225     }
00226 
00227     BLI_freelistN(&pidlist);
00228 
00229     /* free excessive caches */
00230     while (stc) {
00231         SpaceTimeCache *tmp = stc->next;
00232         BLI_remlink(&stime->caches, stc);
00233         MEM_freeN(stc->array);
00234         MEM_freeN(stc);
00235         stc = tmp;
00236     }
00237 }
00238 
00239 static void time_cache_free(SpaceTime *stime)
00240 {
00241     SpaceTimeCache *stc;
00242     
00243     for (stc= stime->caches.first; stc; stc=stc->next) {
00244         if (stc->array) {
00245             MEM_freeN(stc->array);
00246             stc->array = NULL;
00247         }
00248     }
00249     
00250     BLI_freelistN(&stime->caches);
00251 }
00252 
00253 static void time_cache_refresh(SpaceTime *stime)
00254 {
00255     /* Free previous caches to indicate full refresh */
00256     time_cache_free(stime);
00257 }
00258 
00259 /* helper function - find actkeycolumn that occurs on cframe, or the nearest one if not found */
00260 static ActKeyColumn *time_cfra_find_ak (ActKeyColumn *ak, float cframe)
00261 {
00262     ActKeyColumn *akn= NULL;
00263     
00264     /* sanity checks */
00265     if (ak == NULL)
00266         return NULL;
00267     
00268     /* check if this is a match, or whether it is in some subtree */
00269     if (cframe < ak->cfra)
00270         akn= time_cfra_find_ak(ak->left, cframe);
00271     else if (cframe > ak->cfra)
00272         akn= time_cfra_find_ak(ak->right, cframe);
00273         
00274     /* if no match found (or found match), just use the current one */
00275     if (akn == NULL)
00276         return ak;
00277     else
00278         return akn;
00279 }
00280 
00281 /* helper for time_draw_keyframes() */
00282 static void time_draw_idblock_keyframes(View2D *v2d, ID *id, short onlysel)
00283 {
00284     bDopeSheet ads= {NULL};
00285     DLRBT_Tree keys;
00286     ActKeyColumn *ak;
00287     
00288     /* init binarytree-list for getting keyframes */
00289     BLI_dlrbTree_init(&keys);
00290     
00291     /* init dopesheet settings */
00292     if (onlysel)
00293         ads.filterflag |= ADS_FILTER_ONLYSEL;
00294     
00295     /* populate tree with keyframe nodes */
00296     switch (GS(id->name)) {
00297         case ID_SCE:
00298             scene_to_keylist(&ads, (Scene *)id, &keys, NULL);
00299             break;
00300         case ID_OB:
00301             ob_to_keylist(&ads, (Object *)id, &keys, NULL);
00302             break;
00303     }
00304         
00305     /* build linked-list for searching */
00306     BLI_dlrbTree_linkedlist_sync(&keys);
00307     
00308     /* start drawing keyframes 
00309      *  - we use the binary-search capabilities of the tree to only start from 
00310      *    the first visible keyframe (last one can then be easily checked)
00311      *  - draw within a single GL block to be faster
00312      */
00313     glBegin(GL_LINES);
00314         for ( ak=time_cfra_find_ak(keys.root, v2d->cur.xmin); 
00315              (ak) && (ak->cfra <= v2d->cur.xmax); 
00316               ak=ak->next ) 
00317         {
00318             glVertex2f(ak->cfra, v2d->tot.ymin);
00319             glVertex2f(ak->cfra, v2d->tot.ymax);
00320         }
00321     glEnd(); // GL_LINES
00322         
00323     /* free temp stuff */
00324     BLI_dlrbTree_free(&keys);
00325 }
00326 
00327 /* draw keyframe lines for timeline */
00328 static void time_draw_keyframes(const bContext *C, SpaceTime *stime, ARegion *ar)
00329 {
00330     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00331     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
00332     View2D *v2d= &ar->v2d;
00333     short onlysel= (stime->flag & TIME_ONLYACTSEL);
00334     
00335     /* draw scene keyframes first 
00336      *  - don't try to do this when only drawing active/selected data keyframes,
00337      *    since this can become quite slow
00338      */
00339     if (scene && onlysel==0) {
00340         /* set draw color */
00341         glColor3ub(0xDD, 0xA7, 0x00);
00342         time_draw_idblock_keyframes(v2d, (ID *)scene, onlysel);
00343     }
00344     
00345     /* draw keyframes from selected objects 
00346      *  - only do the active object if in posemode (i.e. showing only keyframes for the bones)
00347      *    OR the onlysel flag was set, which means that only active object's keyframes should
00348      *    be considered
00349      */
00350     glColor3ub(0xDD, 0xD7, 0x00);
00351     
00352     if (ob && ((ob->mode == OB_MODE_POSE) || onlysel)) {
00353         /* draw keyframes for active object only */
00354         time_draw_idblock_keyframes(v2d, (ID *)ob, onlysel);
00355     }
00356     else {
00357         short active_done = 0;
00358         
00359         /* draw keyframes from all selected objects */
00360         CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, obsel, selected_objects) 
00361         {
00362             /* last arg is 0, since onlysel doesn't apply here... */
00363             time_draw_idblock_keyframes(v2d, (ID *)obsel, 0);
00364             
00365             /* if this object is the active one, set flag so that we don't draw again */
00366             if (obsel == ob)
00367                 active_done= 1;
00368         }
00369         CTX_DATA_END;
00370         
00371         /* if active object hasn't been done yet, draw it... */
00372         if (ob && (active_done == 0))
00373             time_draw_idblock_keyframes(v2d, (ID *)ob, 0);
00374     }
00375 }

00379 static void time_refresh(const bContext *UNUSED(C), ScrArea *sa)
00380 {
00381     /* find the main timeline region and refresh cache display*/
00382     ARegion *ar= BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_WINDOW);
00383     if (ar) {
00384         SpaceTime *stime = (SpaceTime *)sa->spacedata.first;
00385         time_cache_refresh(stime);
00386     }
00387 }
00388 
00389 /* editor level listener */
00390 static void time_listener(ScrArea *sa, wmNotifier *wmn)
00391 {
00392 
00393     /* mainly for updating cache display */
00394     switch (wmn->category) {
00395         case NC_OBJECT:
00396             switch (wmn->data) {
00397                 case ND_BONE_ACTIVE:
00398                 case ND_POINTCACHE:
00399                 case ND_MODIFIER:
00400                 case ND_PARTICLE:
00401                     ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00402                     ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00403                     break;
00404             }
00405             break;
00406         case NC_SCENE:
00407             switch (wmn->data) {
00408                 case ND_OB_ACTIVE:
00409                 case ND_FRAME:
00410                     ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00411                     break;
00412                 case ND_FRAME_RANGE:
00413                     {
00414                         ARegion *ar;
00415                         Scene *scene = wmn->reference;
00416 
00417                         for (ar= sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar= ar->next) {
00418                             if (ar->regiontype==RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
00419                                 ar->v2d.tot.xmin = (float)(SFRA - 4);
00420                                 ar->v2d.tot.xmax = (float)(EFRA + 4);
00421                                 break;
00422                             }
00423                         }
00424                     }
00425                     break;
00426             }
00427         case NC_SPACE:
00428             switch (wmn->data) {
00429                 case ND_SPACE_CHANGED:
00430                     ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00431                     break;
00432             }
00433         case NC_WM:
00434             switch (wmn->data) {
00435                 case ND_FILEREAD:
00436                     ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00437                     break;
00438             }
00439     }
00440 }

00444 /* add handlers, stuff you only do once or on area/region changes */
00445 static void time_main_area_init(wmWindowManager *wm, ARegion *ar)
00446 {
00447     wmKeyMap *keymap;
00448     
00449     UI_view2d_region_reinit(&ar->v2d, V2D_COMMONVIEW_CUSTOM, ar->winx, ar->winy);
00450     
00451     /* own keymap */
00452     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "Timeline", SPACE_TIME, 0);
00453     WM_event_add_keymap_handler_bb(&ar->handlers, keymap, &ar->v2d.mask, &ar->winrct);
00454 }
00455 
00456 static void time_main_area_draw(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
00457 {
00458     /* draw entirely, view changes should be handled here */
00459     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00460     SpaceTime *stime= CTX_wm_space_time(C);
00461     Object *obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00462     View2D *v2d= &ar->v2d;
00463     View2DGrid *grid;
00464     View2DScrollers *scrollers;
00465     int unit, flag=0;
00466     
00467     /* clear and setup matrix */
00468     UI_ThemeClearColor(TH_BACK);
00469     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
00470     
00471     UI_view2d_view_ortho(v2d);
00472     
00473     /* grid */
00474     unit= (stime->flag & TIME_DRAWFRAMES)? V2D_UNIT_FRAMES: V2D_UNIT_SECONDS;
00475     grid= UI_view2d_grid_calc(scene, v2d, unit, V2D_GRID_CLAMP, V2D_ARG_DUMMY, V2D_ARG_DUMMY, ar->winx, ar->winy);
00476     UI_view2d_grid_draw(v2d, grid, (V2D_VERTICAL_LINES|V2D_VERTICAL_AXIS));
00477     UI_view2d_grid_free(grid);
00478     
00479     /* start and end frame */
00480     time_draw_sfra_efra(scene, v2d);
00481     
00482     /* current frame */
00483     flag = DRAWCFRA_WIDE; /* this is only really needed on frames where there's a keyframe, but this will do... */
00484     if ((stime->flag & TIME_DRAWFRAMES)==0)     flag |= DRAWCFRA_UNIT_SECONDS;
00485     if (stime->flag & TIME_CFRA_NUM)            flag |= DRAWCFRA_SHOW_NUMBOX;
00486     ANIM_draw_cfra(C, v2d, flag);
00487     
00488     UI_view2d_view_ortho(v2d);
00489     
00490     /* keyframes */
00491     time_draw_keyframes(C, stime, ar);
00492     
00493     /* markers */
00494     UI_view2d_view_orthoSpecial(ar, v2d, 1);
00495     draw_markers_time(C, 0);
00496     
00497     /* caches */
00498     time_draw_cache(stime, obact);
00499     
00500     /* reset view matrix */
00501     UI_view2d_view_restore(C);
00502     
00503     /* scrollers */
00504     scrollers= UI_view2d_scrollers_calc(C, v2d, unit, V2D_GRID_CLAMP, V2D_ARG_DUMMY, V2D_ARG_DUMMY);
00505     UI_view2d_scrollers_draw(C, v2d, scrollers);
00506     UI_view2d_scrollers_free(scrollers);
00507 }
00508 
00509 static void time_main_area_listener(ARegion *ar, wmNotifier *wmn)
00510 {
00511     /* context changes */
00512     switch(wmn->category) {
00513         case NC_SPACE:
00514             if (wmn->data == ND_SPACE_TIME)
00515                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00516             break;
00517 
00518         case NC_ANIMATION:
00519             ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00520             break;
00521         
00522         case NC_SCENE:
00523             switch (wmn->data) {
00524                 case ND_OB_SELECT:
00525                 case ND_OB_ACTIVE:
00526                 case ND_FRAME:
00527                 case ND_FRAME_RANGE:
00528                 case ND_KEYINGSET:
00529                 case ND_RENDER_OPTIONS:
00530                     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00531                 break;
00532             }
00533     }
00534 }

00548 
00549 static void time_header_area_listener(ARegion *ar, wmNotifier *wmn)
00550 {
00551     /* context changes */
00552     switch(wmn->category) {
00553         case NC_SCREEN:
00554             if (wmn->data==ND_ANIMPLAY)
00555                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00556             break;
00557 
00558         case NC_SCENE:
00559             switch (wmn->data) {
00560                 case ND_OB_SELECT:
00561                 case ND_FRAME:
00562                 case ND_FRAME_RANGE:
00563                 case ND_KEYINGSET:
00564                 case ND_RENDER_OPTIONS:
00565                     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00566                 break;
00567             }
00568 
00569         case NC_SPACE:
00570             if (wmn->data == ND_SPACE_TIME)
00571                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00572             break;
00573     }
00574 }

00576 /* ******************** default callbacks for time space ***************** */
00577 
00578 static SpaceLink *time_new(const bContext *C)
00579 {
00580     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00581     ARegion *ar;
00582     SpaceTime *stime;
00583 
00584     stime= MEM_callocN(sizeof(SpaceTime), "inittime");
00585 
00586     stime->spacetype= SPACE_TIME;
00587     stime->flag |= TIME_DRAWFRAMES;
00588 
00589     /* header */
00590     ar= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "header for time");
00591     
00592     BLI_addtail(&stime->regionbase, ar);
00593     ar->regiontype= RGN_TYPE_HEADER;
00594     ar->alignment= RGN_ALIGN_BOTTOM;
00595     
00596     /* main area */
00597     ar= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "main area for time");
00598     
00599     BLI_addtail(&stime->regionbase, ar);
00600     ar->regiontype= RGN_TYPE_WINDOW;
00601     
00602     ar->v2d.tot.xmin = (float)(SFRA - 4);
00603     ar->v2d.tot.ymin = 0.0f;
00604     ar->v2d.tot.xmax = (float)(EFRA + 4);
00605     ar->v2d.tot.ymax = 50.0f;
00606     
00607     ar->v2d.cur= ar->v2d.tot;
00608 
00609     ar->v2d.min[0]= 1.0f;
00610     ar->v2d.min[1]= 50.0f;
00611 
00612     ar->v2d.max[0]= MAXFRAMEF;
00613     ar->v2d.max[1]= 50.0; 
00614 
00615     ar->v2d.minzoom= 0.1f;
00616     ar->v2d.maxzoom= 10.0;
00617 
00618     ar->v2d.scroll |= (V2D_SCROLL_BOTTOM|V2D_SCROLL_SCALE_HORIZONTAL);
00619     ar->v2d.align |= V2D_ALIGN_NO_NEG_Y;
00620     ar->v2d.keepofs |= V2D_LOCKOFS_Y;
00621     ar->v2d.keepzoom |= V2D_LOCKZOOM_Y;
00622 
00623 
00624     return (SpaceLink*)stime;
00625 }
00626 
00627 /* not spacelink itself */
00628 static void time_free(SpaceLink *sl)
00629 {
00630     SpaceTime *stime= (SpaceTime *)sl;
00631     
00632     time_cache_free(stime);
00633 }
00634 /* spacetype; init callback in ED_area_initialize() */
00635 /* init is called to (re)initialize an existing editor (file read, screen changes) */
00636 /* validate spacedata, add own area level handlers */
00637 static void time_init(wmWindowManager *UNUSED(wm), ScrArea *sa)
00638 {
00639     SpaceTime *stime= (SpaceTime *)sa->spacedata.first;
00640     
00641     time_cache_free(stime);
00642     
00643     /* enable all cache display */
00644     stime->cache_display |= TIME_CACHE_DISPLAY;
00645     stime->cache_display |= (TIME_CACHE_SOFTBODY|TIME_CACHE_PARTICLES);
00646     stime->cache_display |= (TIME_CACHE_CLOTH|TIME_CACHE_SMOKE|TIME_CACHE_DYNAMICPAINT);
00647 }
00648 
00649 static SpaceLink *time_duplicate(SpaceLink *sl)
00650 {
00651     SpaceTime *stime= (SpaceTime *)sl;
00652     SpaceTime *stimen= MEM_dupallocN(stime);
00653     
00654     stimen->caches.first = stimen->caches.last = NULL;
00655     
00656     return (SpaceLink *)stimen;
00657 }
00658 
00659 /* only called once, from space_api/spacetypes.c */
00660 /* it defines all callbacks to maintain spaces */
00661 void ED_spacetype_time(void)
00662 {
00663     SpaceType *st= MEM_callocN(sizeof(SpaceType), "spacetype time");
00664     ARegionType *art;
00665     
00666     st->spaceid= SPACE_TIME;
00667     strncpy(st->name, "Timeline", BKE_ST_MAXNAME);
00668     
00669     st->new= time_new;
00670     st->free= time_free;
00671     st->init= time_init;
00672     st->duplicate= time_duplicate;
00673     st->operatortypes= time_operatortypes;
00674     st->keymap= NULL;
00675     st->listener= time_listener;
00676     st->refresh= time_refresh;
00677     
00678     /* regions: main window */
00679     art= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegionType), "spacetype time region");
00680     art->regionid = RGN_TYPE_WINDOW;
00681     art->keymapflag= ED_KEYMAP_VIEW2D|ED_KEYMAP_MARKERS|ED_KEYMAP_ANIMATION|ED_KEYMAP_FRAMES;
00682     
00683     art->init= time_main_area_init;
00684     art->draw= time_main_area_draw;
00685     art->listener= time_main_area_listener;
00686     art->keymap= time_keymap;
00687     BLI_addhead(&st->regiontypes, art);
00688     
00689     /* regions: header */
00690     art= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegionType), "spacetype time region");
00691     art->regionid = RGN_TYPE_HEADER;
00692     art->prefsizey= HEADERY;
00693     art->keymapflag= ED_KEYMAP_UI|ED_KEYMAP_VIEW2D|ED_KEYMAP_FRAMES|ED_KEYMAP_HEADER;
00694     
00695     art->init= time_header_area_init;
00696     art->draw= time_header_area_draw;
00697     art->listener= time_header_area_listener;
00698     BLI_addhead(&st->regiontypes, art);
00699         
00700     BKE_spacetype_register(st);
00701 }
